General.Name: NexLiving Communities Inc
General.Description: NexLiving Communities Inc. owns and manages multi-unit residential real estate properties in Eastern Canada. The company focuses on low and mid-rise properties in bedroom communities in Atlantic Canada and Ontario. As of December 31, 2022, it owned and managed 1,016 units in New Brunswick and Ontario. The company was formerly known as ViveRE Communities Inc. and changed its name to NexLiving Communities Inc. in May 2021. NexLiving Communities Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Dartmouth, Canada.
General.Address: 45 Alderney Drive, Dartmouth, NS, Canada, B2Y 2N6
